channel.title: Cannot decompile Black Mesa animations
channel.description:
I am attempting to modify the Gargantua's model, but after recompiling I am left with this:
[img]https://puu.sh/rUUes/47a73c4435.png[/img]
I have (sorta) determined that this is caused by the animations breaking upon being decompiled. I've searched high and low for an answer, and I have found that this is a persistent issue, but nobody has figured out an answer (apart from remaking the animations themselves). Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Cannot decompile Black Mesa animations
item.dc:creator: F_SchoManno
item.description:
Still no solution. Decided to compare how broken the anims are:

Note: this one was compiled with the 2013 SDK as opposed to Black Mesa’s StudioMDL (they generate the same result). can anyone spare some non-corrupt Garg animations?

Read full topic
